video_prompt: Anime woman in black, red eyes, holding handgun, moves through a downpour. Water splashes and glistens dynamically around her. Buildings shift in the blurred background. Her expression subtly changes.
image_prompt: Anime woman, dark hair, fair skin, red eyes, ruby lips, black hat with red/pink flowers and red berries, black long-sleeved dress with golden designs, black belt with golden buckle and blue gem, brown tassel. Wielding a silver handgun with golden muzzle, aimed at viewer. Vertical shot, dynamic downpour, outdoor setting with blurred buildings. Cool, dark color palette, mysterious, intense, dramatic, action-packed. Motion blur on gun.
refined_video_prompt: An anime woman moves deliberately through a torrential downpour. Rain lashes and dynamically splashes, glistening as it strikes her and the ground. The blurred cityscape background continuously shifts and distorts. Her facial expression subtly shifts, conveying evolving emotion.
